game.name: Xtrem Impossible Cargo Truck Simulator
game.description:
Not everyone is capable enough to turn the large-sized truck on the streets or highways. Of course, it requires a high level of expertise in maneuvering the steering wheel of a truck. Luckily, you are going to get a wonderful opportunity today to learn the techniques of turning and driving a truck that is huge in size. Would you like to show your interest in learning this unique driving ability? If yes, join Xtreme Impossible Cargo Truck Simulator and gear up to drive multiple truck vehicles on the impossible tracks.

Choose your truck from the multiple options and then select the level to enter the real fun and thrill of this brand new racing game! It is not going to be easy at all since your chosen truck will also be loaded with various cargo items. Be careful when your truck is on the road as an improper balance can make them fall down. Try to maintain its balance until your cargo items will be delivered at the destination safely!

Today you as a worker in a large cargo company, you will get a chance to drive multiple truck models. Take your seat on your chosen truck and get ready to accelerate the car at a certain speed! Do not forget to slow down the speed of your vehicle when the sharp turn comes to prevent the truck from losing its balance. Good luck to guide your truck through all the unique and addictive 15 levels and become a champion driver!
